pages.text:
In winemaking, aging is used to mellow out existing flavours and introduce new ones into mix.

Each wood type imparts a different flavour into your wine, and the wrong wood can cause discordance in the profile of the finished product.

pages.title: Barrels
pages.text:
Because of this, each wine type requires the correct barrel to achieve perfection.

Every wine also has an optimal barrel time, and the Barrel Age tooltip can be used to hint towards the ideal value.
